overviewTranslations.overview: Precuela de la serie 'Yellowstone', que sigue la historia de la familia Dutton en un viaje hacia el oeste a través de las Grandes Llanuras, para ir hacia el último bastión de la indómita América, durante el año 1883.
Em busca de uma vida melhor, a família Dutton empreende uma perigosa jornada pelas Grandes Planícies em direção às terras que um dia serão o Rancho Yellowstone.

The narrative follows the ancestors of the Dutton family — specifically James Dutton (played by Tim McGraw) and his wife Margaret Dutton (played by Faith Hill) — as they leave poverty in Tennessee/Texas and join a wagon‑train expedition across the Great Plains toward Montana. Their journey is guided by Shea Brennan (played by Sam Elliott), a rugged ex‑Union captain turned Pinkerton agent, among other characters. The series is heavily grounded in the reality of the American West in 1883: dangers of frontier life, immigrant experiences, Indigenous conflicts, disease, weather, and the dream of a new life.
